name: Wikipedia Search and Article Content Verification
description: Test that users can search for “artificial intelligence” on Wikipedia, land on the correct article page, and find a complete, well-structured article with key sections, images, and infobox.
requirements: Enter the term “artificial intelligence” into the search field.
Submit the search by pressing the Enter key.
Validate that the browser navigates to the “Artificial intelligence” article page.
On the article page, verify the presence of all major sections, including but not limited to History, Applications, and Ethics.
Confirm that at least one illustrative image is displayed within the article content.
Confirm that a useful information box (infobox) appears, summarizing key details about Artificial Intelligence.
Assess the overall layout and styling of the article to ensure it looks professional and well-organized.
